entities

Class Park

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Park

  • public class Park
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing the data of a single park.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Park

        public Park(java.lang.String parkID,
            java.lang.String parkName,
            int maxCapacity,
            java.lang.String managerID,
            int maxPreOrders,
            double avgVisitTime,
            int currentNumOfVisitors,
            int openTime,
            int closeTime)
        creates a Park using all fields from the DB.
        Parameters:
        parkID - the park's ID
        parkName - the park's name
        maxCapacity - the park's max visitor capacity
        managerID - the park manager's ID
        maxPreOrders - the maximum amount of preorders allowed
        avgVisitTime - visitors average visit time
        currentNumOfVisitors - amount of visitors currently at the park
        openTime - the park's open time
        closeTime - the park's close time

      • Park

        public Park(java.lang.String parkID,
            java.lang.String parkName,
            int maxCapacity,
            java.lang.String managerID,
            int maxPreOrders,
            int currentNumOfVisitors,
            int openTime,
            int closeTime)
        creates a new Park.
        (the Average VisitTime is 4 hours)
        Parameters:
        parkID - the park's ID
        parkName - the park's name
        maxCapacity - the park's max visitor capacity
        managerID - the park manager's ID
        maxPreOrders - the maximum amount of preorders allowed
        currentNumOfVisitors - amount of visitors currently at the park
        openTime - the park's open time
        closeTime - the park's close time
